testsuite.name: com.ord.coffeemachine.service.CoffeeMachineServiceTest
testsuite.system-out:
Invalid command <> mandatory parameters and [] optional parameters - help: to get list of commands - reset: to reset machine to initial setting - quit: to exit from the application - order: to order beverages, enter beverage name as <beverage1> [<beverage2>, ...] like: order hot_coffee green_tea black_tea hot_tea Following beverages are available : hot_coffee green_tea black_tea hot_tea
hot_coffee cannot be prepared because hot_milk is not available green_tea cannot be prepared because green_mixture is not available black_tea is prepared hot_tea cannot be prepared because sugar_syrup is not available Invalid command Machine reset success! Bye!
